amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to require the Secretary of Treasury to instruct the U.S. Executive Director at each interational financial institution to use the vote and influence of the U.S. to adopt policies that prohibit providing financial assistance to any country deemed by the President to be engaged in oil price fixing harmful to the U.S. economy.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Bachus amendment was withdrawn.
